PartnerInfo.ImpressionF:
Is there truly anything in this world that poses a challenge for Lycaon?
It seems that no matter what obstacles he encounters, he effortlessly solves them all (as long as you touch his tail)!
PartnerInfo.ImpressionM:
Belle, did your comment get mixed up with your personal preferences...?
And Fairy suggested touching Lycaon's chin and head, not his tail.
PartnerInfo.OutlookDesc:
New Eridu Citizen Verification Profile Info:
Hollow Investigator: Lycaon, with an excellent aptitude for Ether, is authorized to perform basic tasks such as investigating and mining in identified Hollows (including Companion Hollows) within New Eridu.
Note: Lycaon's personal files contain a classified section that requires administrator permissions to access.
It is assumed this section contains information about his past and criminal records.
PartnerInfo.ProfileDesc:
Lycaon, the substantive leader and representative of Victoria Housekeeping Co., is responsible for managing all members of the company.
Rational and reliable, Lycaon is an elegant gentleman and a versatile attendant who can solve any problem. He is the cornerstone of his team and a reassuring presence.
He has a slight obsession with cleanliness, always tidying up his surroundings and unable to tolerate dirty environments.

Although Lycaon maintains his elegance and composure, his canine instincts occasionally shine through. When he is particularly happy, his tail and ears unconsciously wag. He seems to be aware of this habit and somewhat bothered by it.
Additionally, like most furry Thiren, Lycaon takes great care of his fur.

Suggestion: Since Lycaon is a canine Thiren, stroking his head or chin may enhance the emotional connection between you. (Note: Success is not guaranteed.)
* Risks: Due to his height, you may not be able to do this even if you stand on tiptoes.
UnlockCondition: Complete Agent Story "And the True Heroes Are Always Behind the Scenes"

TrustLv.1:
Lycaon, the substantive leader and representative of Victoria Housekeeping Co., is responsible for managing all members of the company.
Rational and reliable, Lycaon is an elegant gentleman and a versatile attendant who can solve any problem. He is the cornerstone of his team and a reassuring presence.
He has a slight obsession with cleanliness, always tidying up his surroundings and unable to tolerate dirty environments.

Although Lycaon maintains his elegance and composure, his canine instincts occasionally shine through. When he is particularly happy, his tail and ears unconsciously wag. He seems to be aware of this habit and somewhat bothered by it.
Additionally, like most furry Thiren, Lycaon takes great care of his fur.

Suggestion: Since Lycaon is a canine Thiren, stroking his head or chin may enhance the emotional connection between you. (Note: Success is not guaranteed.)
* Risks: Due to his height, you may not be able to do this even if you stand on tiptoes.
TrustLv.3:
Lycaon has a troubled past that he keeps to himself.
Despite his current elegant and gentle demeanor, the former Lycaon led a wild lifestyle and had a friend whom he trusted implicitly.
However, this friend has now become a bitter enemy.

Note: Due to limited information, it is challenging to uncover the specifics of his past.
You should consider trying to gather information from different angles about the individuals involved to obtain more valuable intelligence.

Description.Name: Basic Attack: Moon Hunter
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> to activate:
Unleashes up to 5 strikes in front, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.
Hold down <IconMap:Icon_Normal> to charge up, increasing the power of the attack and dealing <color=#98EFF0>Ice DMG</color>.

Description.Name: Dodge: Suitable Positioning
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Evade> to activate:
A quick dash dodge.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Dash Attack: Keep it Clean
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> during a dodge to activate:
Slides forward, launching a series of strikes in front, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.

Description.Name: Dodge Counter: Etiquette Manual
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> during a <color=#FFFFFF>Perfect Dodge</color> to activate:
Strikes enemies in front, dealing <color=#98EFF0>Ice DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Special Attack: Time to Hunt
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Special> to activate:
Unleashes a series of strikes in front, dealing <color=#98EFF0>Ice DMG</color>.
Hold down <IconMap:Icon_Special> to charge up, increasing its power.
Anti-Interrupt level is increased while using this skill.

Description.Name: EX Special Attack: Thrill of the Hunt
Description.Desc:
With enough Energy, press <IconMap:Icon_SpecialReady> to activate:
Unleashes a series of powerful strikes in front, dealing massive <color=#98EFF0>Ice DMG</color>.
Hold down <IconMap:Icon_SpecialReady> to charge up, consuming Energy and enhancing the power of the attack.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: EX Special Attack: Thrill of the Hunt
Chain Attack: As You Wish
Description.Desc:
When a <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color> is triggered, select the character to activate:
Unleashes a series of powerful strikes at enemies in a small area in front of him, dealing massive <color=#98EFF0>Ice DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Ultimate: Mission Complete
Description.Desc:
When Decibel Rating is at <color=#FFFFFF>Maximum</color>, press <IconMap:Icon_UltimateReady> to activate:
Unleashes multiple powerful strikes at enemies in a large area, dealing massive <color=#98EFF0>Ice DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Quick Assist: Wolf Pack
Description.Desc:
When the active character is launched, press <IconMap:Icon_Switch> to activate:
Strikes enemies in front, dealing <color=#98EFF0>Ice DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Defensive Assist: Disrupted Hunt
Description.Desc:
When the character on field is about to be attacked, press <IconMap:Icon_Switch> to activate:
Parries the enemy's attack, dealing massive Daze.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Assist Follow-Up: Vengeful Counterattack
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> after a <color=#FFFFFF>Defensive Assist</color> to activate:
Creates an icicle in front, which strikes all enemies within range, dealing <color=#98EFF0>Ice DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

1141004.Name: EX Special Attack: Thrill of the Hunt

Name: Core Passive: Metallic Paws
Additional Ability: Elegant Predator
Desc:
When Lycaon charges his <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color> to completion, the attack deals <color=#2BAD00>40%</color> increased Daze.
When <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>Assist Follow-Up</color> hits an enemy, the target's <color=#98EFF0>Ice DMG RES</color> decreases by 25% for 30s.

When another character in your squad shares the same Attribute or Faction:
When Lycaon hits a Stunned enemy, the target's Stun DMG Multiplier increases by 35%.

1.Name: Full Moon Momentum
1.Desc: When Lycaon's <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color> hits an enemy, the attack's Daze increases by 12%. This effect can trigger once every 8s. When he charges his <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color> to completion, this buff will increase by an additional 10%.
1.Desc2:
Records suggest that werewolves exposed to moonlight become significantly more aggressive.
"Don't stare directly at the moon."

2.Name: Energy Feedback
2.Desc: When Stunning an enemy or triggering a squad member's <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color>, Lycaon gains 5 Energy. Can trigger once every 1s.
2.Desc2:
"Canines receive a brief dopamine boost in their brains after completing semi-complex tasks. At that moment, if their owner pets them to show encouragement, they will be extremely happy..."
Excerpt from the "Handbook of Unreliable Canine Research"

3.Name: Attendant Training
3.Desc2: His every gesture exudes poise, and his words and actions are as refreshing as a spring breeze. An attendant's training is about maintaining control over everything.

4.Name: Graceful Demeanor
4.Desc:
If Lycaon is attacked while using a <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>Special Attack</color>, he will immediately gain a Shield equal to 7.5% of his Max HP, lasting for 15s.
During the Shield's duration, his Anti-Interrupt level is increased. This effect can trigger once every 15s.
4.Desc2: "An outstanding attendant maintains a graceful demeanor at any and all times."

5.Name: Alpha Nature
5.Desc2: His glance harbors a primal ferocity, and the echoes of his howls rumble within his throat. Regardless of his current gracefulness, underneath the formal wear, he's still untamed.

6.Name: Ruthless Hunter
6.Desc: When a charged attack hits an enemy, the target suffers 10% increased DMG from Lycaon, stacking up to 5 times and lasting 12s. Only one stack can be gained per skill use, and repeated triggers reset the duration.
6.Desc2:
"Apologies, but given the circumstances, I will not show any mercy."
"After all, if a fair fight is what you are after, a Hollow is not the place to look for it."
